english.segment1: I used to be mean. Couldn't care 'bout a thing. Livin' for me and all of my needs. I was self-serving. Yet desperate and hurting. In need to be
english.segment2: Not the same. No, no, no, yeah, yeah, yeah. Jesus has changed me. Not the same
english.segment3: It's all for you. All that I am. All that I do. I've given in to life-giving truth. I've come to believe. I can be new. He took my sin. Gave peace within. Took all my doubt. Assured my of Him. He's now why I live. My life is His
english.segment4: Not the same. No, no, no, yeah, yeah, yeah. Jesus has changed me. Not the same
english.segment5: All that I was and. All that I wanted to be. All that has changed. For I am not the same anymore. All that I am and. All that I ever will be. He's now why I live
english.segment6: Not the same. No, no, no, yeah, yeah, yeah. Jesus has changed me. Not the same
